title: Alpha's Tale
description: A sixty-page novella set in the world of the bestselling Survivors series by Erin Hunter! Since the first action-packed Survivors novel, readers have been clamoring for more of the dogs and the world they love. In this original prequel, readers will get a behind-the-scenes look at the story of Alpha, the fierce half-wolf who leads the Wild Pack.Long before the Big Growl struck, Alpha was born the only half-dog in a pack of wolves. The other wolves made him suffer for itâ€”until he swore he would never be the runt of a Pack again. . . . Alpha's Tale also includes a teaser chapter to Survivors #5: The Endless Lake.
author: Erin Hunter
